Title: Expands the membership of the interagency task force on trafficking in persons
Summary: Expands the membership of the interagency task force on trafficking in persons to include the commissioner of the department of transportation, the commissioner of the department of motor vehicles and the executive director of the New York state thruway authority.
LawCode: Amd ยง483-ee, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to expanding the membership of the interagency task force on trafficking in persons
